update dictionary_tag set dictionary_tag_key = #{dictionaryTagKey,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, dictionary_tag_value = #{dictionaryTagValue,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, dictionary_tag_desc = #{dictionaryTagDesc,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, dictionary_id = #{dictionaryId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, create_time = #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.select: select id, dictionary_tag_key, dictionary_tag_value, dictionary_tag_desc, dictionary_id, create_time from dictionary_tag
select concat(d.dictionary_key, dt.dictionary_tag_key) dictionary_tag_key, dt.dictionary_tag_value from dictionary_tag dt join dictionary d on d.id=dt.dictionary_id where d.dictionary_key=#{key}
